channel.title: Azure AI Foundry Model Updates
channel.description: Latest updates on Azure AI Foundry models sold directly by Azure

item.title: gpt-5.2-codex
item.description: A GPT-5.2-series reasoning model optimized for coding workflows, including Codex CLI and the Codex VS Code extension. It supports both Chat Completions and Responses APIs with structured outputs, multimodal (text+image) processing, and advanced tool/function calling including parallel tool calls.

item.title: gpt-5.2
item.description: A GPT-5.2-series reasoning model for general-purpose chat and responses scenarios. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs, structured outputs, multimodal text+image input, and function/tool calling including parallel tool calls.

item.title: gpt-5.2-chat
item.description: A preview GPT-5.2 chat model for Chat Completions and Responses APIs. It supports structured outputs and tool/function calling (including parallel tool calling) but is marked preview and not recommended for production deployments.

item.title: gpt-5.1
item.description: A GPT-5.1-series reasoning model supporting Chat Completions and Responses APIs with structured outputs, multimodal text+image processing, and advanced tool/function calling including parallel tool calls. It introduces a default reasoning_effort of none, which may require code changes when upgrading from earlier reasoning models.

item.title: gpt-5.1-chat
item.description: A preview GPT-5.1 chat model with built-in reasoning capabilities for Chat Completions and Responses APIs. As a reasoning model, it does not support parameters like temperature and is not recommended for production while in preview.

item.title: gpt-5.1-codex
item.description: A GPT-5.1 Codex-optimized model available via the Responses API only, designed for coding and agentic tool use. It supports structured outputs, multimodal text+image processing, and function/tool calling including parallel tool calls, and is optimized for Codex CLI and the Codex VS Code extension.

item.title: gpt-5.1-codex-mini
item.description: A smaller GPT-5.1 Codex-optimized model (Responses API only) intended for coding workflows with tool use. It supports structured outputs, multimodal text+image processing, and function/tool calling including parallel tool calls, and is optimized for Codex CLI and the Codex VS Code extension.

item.title: gpt-5.1-codex-max
item.description: A GPT-5.1 Codex-optimized model (Responses API only) that adds support for setting reasoning_effort to xhigh. It supports structured outputs, multimodal text+image processing, and function/tool calling including parallel tool calls, and is optimized for Codex CLI and the Codex VS Code extension.

item.title: gpt-5
item.description: A GPT-5-series reasoning model for high-capability chat and responses workloads. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs, structured outputs, multimodal text+image processing, and function/tool calling including parallel tool calls.

item.title: gpt-5-mini
item.description: A smaller GPT-5-series reasoning model intended to balance capability and cost. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs, structured outputs, multimodal text+image processing, and function/tool calling including parallel tool calls.

item.title: gpt-5-nano
item.description: A compact GPT-5-series reasoning model designed for efficiency while retaining tool use and multimodal input. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs, structured outputs, text+image processing, and function/tool calling including parallel tool calls.

item.title: gpt-5-chat
item.description: A preview GPT-5 chat model that accepts text and image input and returns text output. Version 2025-10-03 adds an enhancement focused on emotional intelligence and mental health capabilities to improve empathetic and responsible responses.

item.title: gpt-5-codex
item.description: A GPT-5 Codex-optimized model available via the Responses API only, designed for coding and tool-driven workflows. It supports structured outputs, multimodal text+image input, and function/tool calling including parallel tool calls, and is optimized for Codex CLI and the Codex VS Code extension.

item.title: gpt-5-pro
item.description: A GPT-5-series reasoning model available via the Responses API, designed for advanced reasoning with structured outputs and multimodal text+image processing. It supports functions and tools and targets high-capability scenarios where reasoning depth is important.

item.title: gpt-oss-120b
item.description: An open-weight reasoning model (preview) for text-in/text-out chat scenarios. It supports Chat Completions API features like streaming, function calling, and structured outputs, and can be deployed (with a Foundry project requirement) or used via managed compute.

item.title: gpt-oss-20b
item.description: A smaller open-weight reasoning model (preview) for text-in/text-out chat workloads. It supports streaming, function calling, and structured outputs via the Chat Completions API and is available via managed compute and Foundry Local.

item.title: gpt-4.1
item.description: A multimodal model that accepts text and images and produces text output, supporting both Chat Completions and Responses APIs. It includes streaming, function calling, and structured outputs (Chat Completions), with a very large context window; a known issue can cause failures when tool/function definitions exceed ~300k tokens.

item.title: gpt-4.1-mini
item.description: A smaller GPT-4.1-series multimodal model supporting text+image input and text output via Chat Completions and Responses APIs. It supports streaming, function calling, and structured outputs (Chat Completions), and shares the known issue where very large tool/function definitions can fail around 300k tokens.

item.title: gpt-4.1-nano
item.description: A compact GPT-4.1-series multimodal model for text+image input and text output, available via Chat Completions and Responses APIs. It supports streaming, function calling, and structured outputs (Chat Completions), and is affected by the same large tool/function definition issue around 300k tokens.

item.title: computer-use-preview
item.description: An experimental preview model trained to work with the Responses API computer use tool for controlling mouse/keyboard with screenshot context. It supports tools and streaming with text input/output and image input, and requires registration for access.

item.title: codex-mini
item.description: An o-series coding model that is a fine-tuned version of o4-mini, designed for tool-driven coding tasks. It is available via the Responses API and supports structured outputs, multimodal text+image processing, and functions/tools.

item.title: o3-pro
item.description: An advanced o-series reasoning model focused on strong problem-solving for domains like science, coding, and math. It supports the Responses API with structured outputs, multimodal text+image processing, and functions/tools.

item.title: o4-mini
item.description: A newer o-series reasoning model offering enhanced reasoning abilities for complex tasks. It supports both Chat Completions and Responses APIs, structured outputs, multimodal text+image processing, and functions/tools.

item.title: o3
item.description: A newer o-series reasoning model designed for increased focus and capability on problem-solving tasks. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs, structured outputs, multimodal text+image processing, and functions/tools including parallel tool calling.

item.title: o3-mini
item.description: A smaller o-series reasoning model with enhanced reasoning abilities for text-only workloads. It supports structured outputs and functions/tools, targeting efficient reasoning use cases.

item.title: o1
item.description: An o-series reasoning model with enhanced reasoning abilities and multimodal text+image processing. It supports structured outputs and functions/tools for advanced problem-solving scenarios.

item.title: o1-preview
item.description: An older preview version in the o1 series. It is available only to customers who were granted access as part of the original limited access release.

item.title: o1-mini
item.description: A faster and more cost-efficient o1-series model, positioned as ideal for coding tasks requiring speed and lower resource consumption. Global Standard deployment is available by default, while standard (regional) deployments are limited to select customers from the o1-preview limited access release.

item.title: gpt-4o
item.description: A multimodal GPT-4o (Omni) model that integrates text and images in a single model for improved responsiveness and accuracy. It supports structured outputs, JSON mode, and parallel function calling, with strong non-English and vision performance; multiple dated versions are listed.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini
item.description: A fast, inexpensive multimodal model intended as a capable replacement for GPT-3.5 Turbo series models. It supports text and image processing, JSON mode, and parallel function calling.

item.title: gpt-4 (turbo-2024-04-09)
item.description: GPT-4 Turbo with Vision is a generally available model used with the Chat Completions API. It replaces earlier GPT-4 preview models (vision-preview, 1106-Preview, 0125-Preview), though feature availability can vary by input method and deployment type.

item.title: text-embedding-3-large
item.description: The latest and most capable third-generation embedding model for converting text into vectors for similarity and retrieval. It supports a dimensions parameter to reduce embedding size for cost/performance control, and migration from older embedding models requires regenerating embeddings.

item.title: text-embedding-3-small
item.description: A third-generation embedding model that converts text into vectors for similarity and retrieval, offering improved multilingual retrieval performance over older models. It supports the dimensions parameter to reduce embedding size for cost/performance tradeoffs.

item.title: text-embedding-ada-002
item.description: A legacy embedding model used to convert text into numerical vectors for similarity and retrieval. The documentation notes you cannot upgrade between embedding models; moving to text-embedding-3-large requires generating new embeddings, and multiple versions (v1 and v2) exist with different max token limits.

item.title: gpt-image-1
item.description: A GPT-image-1 series image generation model in limited access preview that generates images from text prompts (and supports image-related workflows per the series description). Access requires registration and deployment after approval, and it is available in select Global Standard regions.

item.title: gpt-image-1-mini
item.description: A smaller GPT-image-1 series image generation model in limited access preview for generating images from text prompts. Access requires registration and is available in select Global Standard regions.

item.title: gpt-image-1.5
item.description: A GPT-image series image generation model in limited access preview for generating images from text prompts. Access requires registration and is available in select Global Standard regions.

item.title: dall-e-3
item.description: An image generation model that creates original images from natural language prompts. It is generally available for use with the REST APIs, with region availability including East US, Australia East, and Sweden Central; SDK usage is noted as preview.

item.title: sora
item.description: An OpenAI video generation model that creates realistic and imaginative video scenes from text instructions. It is in preview and available in East US 2 and Sweden Central (Global Standard).

item.title: sora-2
item.description: A newer Sora video generation model that generates video scenes from text instructions. It is in preview and available in East US 2 and Sweden Central (Global Standard).

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-audio-preview
item.description: A GPT-4o-family preview audio model for audio and text generation. It supports large token inputs and is intended for conversational or generative audio scenarios within the GPT-4o audio model family.

item.title: gpt-4o-audio-preview
item.description: A GPT-4o-family preview audio model for audio and text generation. It is part of the GPT-4o audio model family and is intended for conversational interactions or audio generation workflows.

item.title: gpt-4o-realtime-preview
item.description: A GPT-4o-family preview model for real-time audio processing. It targets low-latency speech-in/speech-out or real-time audio interactions and is listed with multiple dated versions.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-realtime-preview
item.description: A GPT-4o mini-family preview model for real-time audio processing. It supports low-latency audio interactions and is part of the GPT-4o audio model family.

item.title: gpt-realtime
item.description: A generally available (GA) audio model for real-time audio processing. It is available via Azure OpenAI realtime/completions/audio APIs and is part of the newer audio model lineup distinct from the GPT-4o audio previews.

item.title: gpt-realtime-mini
item.description: A smaller real-time audio model for low-latency audio processing. It is listed with multiple versions, including a dated variant (gpt-realtime-mini-2025-12-15), and is available via Azure OpenAI realtime/completions/audio APIs.

item.title: gpt-realtime-mini-2025-12-15
item.description: A specific versioned variant of gpt-realtime-mini for real-time audio processing. It is part of the audio model lineup available via Azure OpenAI realtime/completions/audio APIs.

item.title: gpt-audio
item.description: An audio model for real-time audio processing available via Azure OpenAI realtime/completions/audio APIs. It is part of the newer audio model lineup and is listed as generally available alongside gpt-realtime.

item.title: gpt-audio-mini
item.description: A smaller audio model for real-time audio processing available via Azure OpenAI realtime/completions/audio APIs. It is listed with multiple versions, including a dated variant (2025-12-15).

item.title: whisper
item.description: A general-purpose speech recognition model used via the /audio API for speech-to-text (and listed for speech translation). It supports audio file uploads up to 25 MB per request.

item.title: gpt-4o-transcribe
item.description: A speech-to-text model powered by GPT-4o, available via the /audio API. It supports audio file uploads up to 25 MB per request for transcription.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-transcribe
item.description: A speech-to-text model powered by GPT-4o mini, available via the /audio API. It supports audio file uploads up to 25 MB per request for transcription.

item.title: gpt-4o-transcribe-diarize
item.description: A speech-to-text model that includes diarization/automatic speech recognition capabilities, available via the /audio API. It supports audio file uploads up to 25 MB per request.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-transcribe-2025-12-15
item.description: A versioned speech-to-text model with improved transcription accuracy and robustness, available via the /audio API. It supports audio file uploads up to 25 MB per request.

item.title: tts
item.description: A preview text-to-speech model optimized for speed, available via the /audio API. It converts text into speech audio output for low-latency synthesis scenarios.

item.title: tts-hd
item.description: A preview text-to-speech model optimized for quality, available via the /audio API. It targets higher-fidelity speech synthesis compared to the speed-optimized tts model.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-tts
item.description: A preview text-to-speech model powered by GPT-4o mini, available via the /audio API. It supports guiding the voice to speak in a specific style or tone.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-tts-2025-12-15
item.description: A versioned preview text-to-speech model powered by GPT-4o mini, available via the /audio API. It supports guiding the voice to speak in a specific style or tone.

item.title: model-router
item.description: A Microsoft model that routes requests to underlying models based on the prompt, supporting text and image input with a large context window. It has multiple versions (including 2025-11-18) and is available in Global Standard and Data Zone Standard in East US 2 and Sweden Central, with Data Zone billing starting no earlier than Nov 1, 2025.

item.title: o3-deep-research
item.description: A specialized o-series model intended for deep research workflows. It is currently only available with Foundry Agent Service according to the model availability notes.

item.title: FLUX.2-pro
item.description: A Black Forest Labs image generation and editing model that supports both text and image prompts, including multi-reference inputs. Key features include support for up to 8 reference images (via API), more grounded outputs, greater flexibility, and enhanced performance; it is available as Global Standard in all regions.

item.title: FLUX.1-Kontext-pro
item.description: A Black Forest Labs in-context image generation and editing model supporting text+image input for character consistency and advanced editing. It is available via Azure Image API endpoints and a provider-specific API (preview api-version), and is Global Standard in all regions.

item.title: FLUX-1.1-pro
item.description: A Black Forest Labs text-to-image generation model emphasizing fast inference, strong prompt adherence, competitive pricing, and scalable generation. It is available via Azure Image API endpoints and a provider-specific API (preview api-version), and is Global Standard in all regions.

item.title: Cohere-rerank-v4.0-pro
item.description: A Cohere rerank/text-classification model for ranking and relevance tasks across many languages. It returns JSON and is available in Global Standard (all regions) and via managed compute.

item.title: Cohere-rerank-v4.0-fast
item.description: A faster Cohere rerank/text-classification model for ranking and relevance tasks across many languages. It returns JSON and is available in Global Standard (all regions) and via managed compute.

item.title: Cohere-command-a
item.description: A Cohere chat-completion model optimized for enterprise use cases such as reasoning, summarization, and question answering. It supports tool calling and returns either text or JSON, and is available in Global Standard (all regions).

item.title: embed-v-4-0
item.description: A Cohere embeddings model that supports both text and image inputs and outputs vectors with selectable dimensionality. It is available in Global Standard (all regions) and supports multiple languages.

item.title: DeepSeek-V3.2-Speciale
item.description: A DeepSeek chat-completion model that includes reasoning content, designed for step-by-step reasoning tasks such as scientific reasoning and coding. It supports text input/output with large context and is available in Global Standard (all regions).

item.title: DeepSeek-V3.2
item.description: A DeepSeek chat-completion model with reasoning content for complex reasoning tasks. It supports large text input/output and is available in Global Standard (all regions).

item.title: DeepSeek-V3.1
item.description: A DeepSeek chat-completion model with reasoning content that supports tool calling for more agentic workflows. It supports large text input/output and is available in Global Standard (all regions).

item.title: DeepSeek-R1-0528
item.description: A DeepSeek reasoning chat-completion model with reasoning content designed for high-context reasoning tasks. It is available in both Global Standard and Global Provisioned managed (all regions).

item.title: DeepSeek-V3-0324
item.description: A DeepSeek chat-completion model that supports tool calling for agentic workflows. It is available in both Global Standard and Global Provisioned managed (all regions).

item.title: DeepSeek-R1
item.description: A DeepSeek reasoning chat-completion model with reasoning content for step-by-step reasoning tasks. It is available in both Global Standard and Global Provisioned managed (all regions).

item.title: Llama-4-Maverick-17B-128E-Instruct-FP8
item.description: A Meta Llama multimodal chat-completion model supporting text and image inputs with very large context and output limits. It is available in Global Standard (all regions) and targets multilingual enterprise use cases.

item.title: Llama-3.3-70B-Instruct
item.description: A Meta Llama chat-completion model for instruction-following text workloads with a large context window. It is available in Global Standard (all regions) and supports multiple languages.

item.title: MAI-DS-R1
item.description: A Microsoft chat-completion model with reasoning content designed for high-context reasoning tasks. It is available in Global Standard (all regions) and supports English and Chinese.

item.title: Mistral-Large-3
item.description: A Mistral multimodal chat-completion model supporting text and image input with tool calling and JSON responses. It is available as Global Standard in West US 3.

item.title: mistral-document-ai-2505
item.description: A Mistral Image-to-Text model for extracting text from images or PDF pages (up to 30 pages / 30MB). It outputs text (including JSON/Markdown formats) and is available in Global Standard (all regions) and Data Zone Standard (US and EU).

item.title: Kimi-K2.5
item.description: A Moonshot AI multimodal reasoning model that accepts text and image input and returns text output with reasoning content. It supports tool calling and is available in Global Standard (all regions).

item.title: Kimi-K2-Thinking
item.description: A Moonshot AI reasoning model positioned as the most capable open-source thinking model in this lineup. It supports tool calling with large text input/output and is available in Global Standard (all regions).

item.title: grok-4
item.description: xAI's latest reasoning model with advanced reasoning and tool-use capabilities for enterprise domains. It supports tool calling, is text-only (no image input), requires registration for access, and is available in Global Standard (all regions).

item.title: grok-4-fast-reasoning
item.description: An efficiency-optimized Grok 4 Fast variant that provides reasoning capabilities with lower latency and cost, supporting tool use and multimodal (text+image) input. It is available in Global Standard (all regions) and Data Zone Standard (US).

item.title: grok-4-fast-non-reasoning
item.description: A Grok 4 Fast variant that can bypass reasoning for ultra-fast applications while still supporting tool use and multimodal (text+image) input. It is available in Global Standard (all regions) and Data Zone Standard (US).

item.title: grok-code-fast-1
item.description: A fast and efficient reasoning model designed for agentic coding applications, trained on coding-focused data and demonstrations of tool use and safe refusals. Registration is required for access, and it is available in Global Standard (all regions).

item.title: grok-3
item.description: A non-reasoning Grok model tailored for business use cases like data extraction, coding, and summarization with strong instruction following. It supports tool calling and is available in Global Standard (all regions) and Data Zone Standard (US).

item.title: grok-3-mini
item.description: A lightweight reasoning model trained for agentic, coding, mathematical, and deep science problems with test-time compute and adjustable thinking budgets. It supports tool calling and is available in Global Standard (all regions) and Data Zone Standard (US).

item.title: Ministral-3B (preview) (2411)
item.description: A preview Mistral model listed for fine-tuning availability (global training supported, standard regions not supported). It is a text-to-text model with unknown output limits and training example context length in the provided table.

item.title: Qwen-32B (preview)
item.description: A preview Qwen model listed for fine-tuning availability (global training supported, standard regions not supported). It is a text-to-text model with an 8,000 token input and up to 32,000 token output in the fine-tuning table.

item.title: gpt-4
item.description: A GPT-4 model family referenced for Assistants and provisioned deployments, with multiple versions including 0613, 1106-Preview, and 0125-Preview. These models are used with the Chat Completions API and have region-dependent availability.

item.title: gpt-4-32k
item.description: A GPT-4 variant referenced for Assistants and provisioned deployments with a larger context window (32k). Availability is region-dependent as shown in the Assistants/provisioned availability tables.

item.title: gpt-35-turbo
item.description: A GPT-3.5 Turbo family referenced for Assistants and provisioned deployments, with multiple versions such as 0613, 1106, and 0125 (and a 16k variant). Availability is region-dependent in the Assistants table.

item.title: gpt-35-turbo-16k
item.description: A GPT-3.5 Turbo variant with a larger context window referenced for Assistants usage. Availability is region-dependent as shown in the Assistants table.
